description: This file defines a React component named StatusBadge that visually represents a status using themed colors. It includes type definitions, a utility function for color mapping, and the component itself.

methods.name: statusColor
methods.description: Maps a status string to corresponding Tailwind CSS class strings for styling.

methods.name: StatusBadge
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a status badge with themed color styling and accessibility features.
